ComicInfo.Series: George R. R. Martin's Fevre Dream
ComicInfo.Summary:
The ten-issue vampire epic on the bayou from the writer of the A Song of Ice and Fire novels continues in issue seven!
From the New York Times Best-selling author, George R. R. Martin, comes a tale of vampire clans, death and debauchery, legendary blood masters, and even a few epic steamboat races on the muddy Mississippi. This is Martin's FEVRE DREAM, an antebellum story of power, loss, and the fever of bloodlust.
After a disastrous dinner with Damon Julian, there may be no hope left for York. But Abner Marsh doesn't have time to worry about his friend and business partner, because he's too busy running for his life from a coven of cruel vampires and one psychotic sour Billy. And the sun has set over the Mississippi river, so nowhere is safe...
Each issue of this stunning full-color epic is illustrated by Rafa Lopez, an artist whose skilled line captures every moonlit drop of blood in delicious detail. Adapted by the Hugo-nominated author Daniel Abraham, this version of FEVRE DREAM stays faithful to Martin's original dark vision, while bringing the torture and joy of his vampires to almost-human life. This haunting series is available with Regular and Wraparound painted covers by Felipe Massafera.
